004package mkt;
005
006import java.util.ArrayList;
007import kut.Js;
008import kut.Arr;
009
010/** Result of 'Strategy.open' */
011public class StRs {
012  /** Every market order ordered by date. */
013  public final ArrayList<Order> orders;
014  /** Real assets historic. One value for each date. */
015  public final double[] hreals;
016  /** Accounting assets historic. One value for each date. */
017  public final double[] haccs;
018  /** References assets historic. One value for each date. */
019  public final double[] hrefs;
020  /** Withdrawals historic. One value for each date.*/
021  public final double[] hwithdrawals;
022  /** Final cash + withdrawals. */
023  public final double cash;
024  /** Buy dates. One array for each company (from before to after) */
025  public final ArrayList<String>[] buys;
026  /** Sale dates. One array for each company (from before to after) */
027  public final ArrayList<String>[] sales;
028  /** Profits ratios. One for each company. */
029  public final double[] profits;
030
031  /**
032   * Constructor.
033   * @param orders Every market order ordered by date.
034   * @param hreals Real assets historic. One value for each date.
035   * @param haccs Accounting assets historic. One value for each date.
036   * @param hrefs Reference assets historic. One value for each date.
037   * @param hwithdrawals Withdrawals historic. One value for each date.
038   * @param cash Final cash + withdrawals.
039   * @param buys Buy dates. One array for each company (from before to after)
040   * @param sales sale dates. One array for each company (from before to after)
041   * @param profits Profits ratios. One for each company.
042   */
043  public StRs (
044    ArrayList<Order> orders, double[] hreals, double[] haccs, double[] hrefs,
045    double[] hwithdrawals, double cash,
046    ArrayList<String>[] buys, ArrayList<String>[] sales, double[] profits
047  ) {
048    this.orders = orders;
049    this.hreals = hreals;
050    this.haccs = haccs;
051    this.hrefs = hrefs;
052    this.hwithdrawals = hwithdrawals;
053    this.cash = cash;
054    this.buys = buys;
055    this.sales = sales;
056    this.profits = profits;
057  }
058
059  /**
060   * Returns object JSONized.
061   * @param o Ditto.
062   * @return Ditto.
063   */
064  public static String toJs (StRs o) {
065    return Js.w(Arr.mk(
066      Js.w(Arr.map(o.orders, Order::toJs)),
067      Js.w(Arr.map(Arr.mk(o.hreals), (v) -> Js.w(v, 2))),
068      Js.w(Arr.map(Arr.mk(o.haccs), (v) -> Js.w(v, 2))),
069      Js.w(Arr.map(Arr.mk(o.hrefs), (v) -> Js.w(v, 2))),
070      Js.w(Arr.map(Arr.mk(o.hwithdrawals), (v) -> Js.w(v, 2))),
071      Js.w(o.cash),
072      Js.w(Arr.map(Arr.mk(o.buys), (lst) -> Js.w(Arr.map(lst, Js::w)))),
073      Js.w(Arr.map(Arr.mk(o.sales), (lst) -> Js.w(Arr.map(lst, Js::w)))),
074      Js.w(Arr.map(Arr.mk(o.profits), (v) -> Js.w(v, 4)))
075    ));
076  }
077
078  /**
079   * Returns object from JSON.
080   * @param js JSON string.
081   * @return Ditto.
082   */
083  public static StRs fromJs (String js) {
084    ArrayList<String> a = Js.ra(js);
085    return new StRs(
086      Arr.map(Js.ra(a.get(1)), Order::fromJs),
087      Arr.toDoubles(Arr.map(Js.ra(a.get(2)), Js::rn)),
088      Arr.toDoubles(Arr.map(Js.ra(a.get(2)), Js::rn)),
089      Arr.toDoubles(Arr.map(Js.ra(a.get(2)), Js::rn)),
090      Arr.toDoubles(Arr.map(Js.ra(a.get(3)), Js::rn)),
091      Js.rn(a.get(4)),
092      Arr.to(Arr.map(Js.ra(a.get(5)), (lstJs) -> Arr.map(Js.ra(lstJs), Js::rs))),
093      Arr.to(Arr.map(Js.ra(a.get(6)), (lstJs) -> Arr.map(Js.ra(lstJs), Js::rs))),
094      Arr.toDoubles(Arr.map(Js.ra(a.get(7)), Js::rn))
095    );
096  }
097
098}
